description: Creates a new password for a user using previously obtained password reset code
name: GrapeCreateNewPassword

ri.description: Reset identifier for the user to reset

new_password.description: Hex encoded utf8 password, encrypted with the password reset code emailed to the user. Encryption uses AES-CBC with PKCS#7 padding

message.description: If an error occurred, a message will be provided

error.description: If an error occurred, this field will contain the error object
